name: Strawberry Chocolate Cinnamon Rolls
description: These Strawberry Chocolate Cinnamon rolls are a perfect for breakfast or brunch this holiday season. Even better with a chocolate glaze. Vegan Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 cup ripe strawberries (fresh or thawed if frozen)
1/2 cup non dairy milk like almond or coconut
2 1/4 to 2 1/2 cup flour (I use unbleached white flour)
1 Tbsp oil  (or melted vegan butter or oil spray)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine water, 1 tsp sugar and yeast. Let it sit for 2 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine water, 1 tsp sugar and yeast. Let it sit for 2 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the strawberries with non dairy milk, vanilla and sugar until smooth and keep aside. (warm this mixture to room temperature if the strawberries were frozen)
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the strawberries with non dairy milk, vanilla and sugar until smooth and keep aside. (warm this mixture to room temperature if the strawberries were frozen)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add flours, salt, baking powder and whisk well. Add the yeast mixture, strawberry puree and oil. Mix and knead into a soft, somewhat sticky dough.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add flours, salt, baking powder and whisk well. Add the yeast mixture, strawberry puree and oil. Mix and knead into a soft, somewhat sticky dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Use flour to roll the dough out into a 10 by 16 inch rectangle.
recipeInstructions.name: Use flour to roll the dough out into a 10 by 16 inch rectangle.

recipeInstructions.text: Brush vegan butter or oil. Sprinkle cinnamon, distribute the chocolate chips. Sprinkle sugar if you like the filling sticky sweet.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush vegan butter or oil. Sprinkle cinnamon, distribute the chocolate chips. Sprinkle sugar if you like the filling sticky sweet.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll up the rectangle into a jelly roll and seal the edges. Slice into 1 inch slices. Place in 8 by 8 square pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll up the rectangle into a jelly roll and seal the edges. Slice into 1 inch slices. Place in 8 by 8 square pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water on top. Then spray oil. cover with a towel and let rise for 30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water on top. Then spray oil. cover with a towel and let rise for 30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F / 190ºc. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden on top. Cool for 5 minutes then remove from the pan. Lightly cover with a towel to cool for another 5-10 minutes, then glaze and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F / 190ºc. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden on top. Cool for 5 minutes then remove from the pan. Lightly cover with a towel to cool for another 5-10 minutes, then glaze and serve.

itemListElement.text: Heat the almond milk to just about boiling. Add chocolate chips and vanilla., Whisk until smooth. Drizzle over the cinnamon rolls before serving.
itemListElement.name: Heat the almond milk to just about boiling. Add chocolate chips and vanilla., Whisk until smooth. Drizzle over the cinnamon rolls before serving.
